note.p: Daughter of John Charles Conybeare and his wife Katherine Mary Vansittart. Married Edward Robert Pearce Edgcumbe in 1884.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/931/22/35)
London, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1921 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 August 2016)
Glamorganshire, Wales, Anglican baptisms, marriages and burials, 1570–1994 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 November 2022)
